metadata.title: CVE-2016-1016 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the Transform object implementation inAdobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.343 and 19.x through 21.x before21.0.0.213 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.616 on Linux allowsattackers to execute arbitrary code via a flash.geom.Matrix callback, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2016-1011, CVE-2016-1013, CVE-2016-1017,and CVE-2016-1031.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.616ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.616ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.616ubuntu0.14.04.1').
